text: Sergio Corona Ortega (born October 7, 1928) is a Mexican television and movie actor and comedian of the Golden Age Of Mexican Cinema. He has appeared in over 50 telenovelas. Corona is known for his roles as Don Tomas Leon in the Mexican telenovela Como dice el dicho and as Don Boni in Plaza SÃ©samo (Spanish version of Sesame Street). He also appeared as a bellboy in the 1989 James Bond movie License to Kill. Corona was born in Pachuca, Hidalgo, Mexico. ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Mexican comedians Category:People from Hidalgo (state)
title: Sergio Corona
